alert.note: Alert for Florence (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 7:12PM CDT until July 10 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN FLORENCE COUNTY... At 711 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Iron Mountain to near Fern, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Florence County, including the following locations... Aurora, Fence, West Bass Lake Campground, Lasalle Falls and Spread Eagle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
